entry.title: Impact Crossover Leggings (Set)
entry.summary:
Vendor: KOR-Crossover-Set
Type: Leggings
Price: 48.00

Street meets luxe, for practice & all your other plans. The KOR Impact Legging Set is a wear-right-now, love-forever superstar thanks to the fresh design.  Grab both colors of this classic, hot look.

Details:

- For working out and wearing out
- Convenient pocket near right hip
- Designed & uniquely fit to flatter every size
- Wear-tested by our in-house team for the perfect fit
- Model is 5'5" and is wearing a size Medium

    Sizing:  Order true to fit or size up if in between.

Vendor: Limited-sports-bra
Type: Sports Bras
Price: 35.00

BFCM Special: Limited White Sports-Bra

Not your boring old sports-bra. This bra features full support in the front and is uniquely designed with 5 straps in the back.  Can be mixed and matched with any of our leggings to complete the look!

FEATURES:
* 87% Nylon 13% Spandex Material
* Removable Padding
* Model is 5'4" and wearing a size M 
* Runs True to Size

Meet your next favorite bra: Flex High Support Sports-Bra.

With a sleek fit that feels like a second skin, this bra features advanced sweat-wicking technology to keep you cool and dry during any workout. 

Contour seam lines finish the look, running fluidly to flatter your physique. 
Mix and match with any of our leggings to complete the look!

Details:

* Removable padding
* Model is 5'4" and wearing a size medium

entry.title: Camo Crossback Sports Bra

Vendor: camouflage-printed-fitness-leggings

Price: 21.00 - 25.00 (15 variants)

Level up your workout game with our new Camo Crossback Sports Bra. This is one of our best-sellers. Features a wide elastic under band support to give your breasts extra support and push. Mix & Match with any legging!  

 

FEATURES:

  • Medium support  
  • Runs true to size. (Model is wearing a Medium)
  • Cross over back strap
  • Removable padding
  • 54% Nylon, 34% Polyester, 12% Spandex
  • Breathable seamless fabric
  • Material wicks sweat & dries quickly
